info.name: Calcar avis
info.description: The calcar avis is a longitudinal eminence on the medial wall of the posterior horn of the lateral ventricle.  It is formed by the calcarine fissure pushing into the lateral ventricle from the medial aspect of the occipital lobe.
info.item: /Sections/Thick, Whole Brain/Coronal/ Frontal to Occipital/10 Cor: Fr to Occ
